articles.description: The US vice president is beginning his UK holiday with a visit to the foreign secretary. Since when were they so close?
articles.title: The unlikely bond between JD Vance and David Lammy

articles.description: Commander of Apollo 13, who rescued his men from a near certain death in space, has died aged 97.
articles.title: Jim Lovell, who guided Apollo 13 safely back to Earth, dies aged 97

articles.description: Officers had been investigating an attack on another Asian man, two weeks before Bhim Kohli died.
articles.title: Bhim Kohli death: Police 'sat on information' before dog walker, 80, fatally attacked

articles.description: The first extracts from the former first minister's new memoir are being serialised by The Times.
